text: The Volkswagen Polo Mk4 is the fourth generation of the small car Volkswagen Polo. It replaced the Mk3 in early 2002 and featured twin round headlights which remained until its facelift in mid-2005 and in late 2009 was replaced by the Mk5. The platform of the Mk4 Polo was also used for the SEAT Ibiza, the SEAT Córdoba and the Škoda Fabia. == Engines == * 1.2 40 kW (54 hp) and 44 kW (60 hp) * 1.2 12V 47 kW (64 hp) and 51 kW (69 hp) * 1.4 16V 55 kW (75 hp), 59 kW (80 hp) and 74 kW (101 hp) * 1.4 FSI 63 kW (86 hp) * 1.6 16V 77 kW (105 hp) * 1.8T GTI 110 kW (150 hp) * 1.8T GTI Cup Edition 132 kW (180 hp) * 1.4 TDI 51 kW (70 hp), 55 kW (75 hp) and 59 kW (80 hp) * 1.9 SDI 47 kW (64 hp) * 1.9 TDI 74 kW (101 hp) and 96 kW (130 hp) Polo Mk4 Category:2000s automobiles
title: Volkswagen Polo Mk4
